title: Serum BDNF and pro-BDNF levels in alcohol use disorders according to depression status: An exploratory study of their evolution two months after withdrawal
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Thibaut Gellé, Théodore Vinais, Aurélie Lacroix, Brigitte Plansont, Philippe Nubukpo, Murielle Girard
